mage ekama duwe umbaata mama dena me awawade age sithin pilipaddoth in mathu diyunuwa pade lindakata panapan kiwwath panina eya eka pimme oba dun owadanak nopiligaththe kawadada mamme kanata nogena hanamiti karayin kiyana bamunu katha hithata ganin mamma dena me owadan hodin itha pappa ge adahasa kawadath parana widiyata ma innata puppayi monawa hari kiwothin mawa wisiwennata pappa numbae tharuna kale konde bandala hitiye mulin kappewuwe mamayi eda bandinna masekata kalin thama penawa ee gathi eekayi witakadi wahinne somapala kenek nisa thamayi parana thati gahanne gamanak gos enawita himi geta gannalu paya soda pothaka thibenu dutuwemi mamme eya denawada pahada wadakata nathi katha oowa mage me kiyamana ahapan mada ganena geta aawoth payippe gawata arapan unde wage bandinu epa konde wawa dig gassana donki thiya kota kala tharamatayi duwe hada lassana gedara dore wada samagin nithara wawana inguru duru kawaradakawath amme mewa mata nomatha huru patha potha liyala thibunata ada rata thota gana hithapan nambaiya penwa andima dath penenna sinasima mewa mata nokarama ba, mala kolan ane mehema bamunu katha oya serama dotar ahakata danna(*) hina weyan angata hondayi allapu waththata ahenna (*) me pade ape ammata amathaka wela hinda mayi liwwe.

shri lanka ithihasaye suwishesha kala parichjedayak lesa salakena 14-15 yana shatha warshayan thula lakdiwa aga nagaraya wuye shri jayawardhanapura kotte rajadhaniyayi. 1977 di ewakata janapathiwa siti je .aar jayawardhana mahatha shri jayawardhanapura kotte paripalana aganagaraya lesa nawatha maru kirimata gath thiranaya wasara 30kata pasu shri lankawe ithihasaya nawatha liyawena karanayak weyayi kisida nosithannata atha. 2009 wasare mayi 18 wana dina, merata wasara 30 k pura pawathi thrasthawadi yuddhaya nimakara merata ekama dhajayak yatathe eksesath kirimata mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathithumata hakiwiya.
